title: Integrative Healing Arts Studio
cleaned_text: Celebrating 11 years in 2023! Integrative Healing Arts Studio offers an eclectic assortment of services and classes to support mind~body~spirit wellness. The studio was established in 2012 and has been residing on Penn Avenue, West Reading Pennsylvania since 2013. Christina Rossi, BS, LMT, BCTMB is approved by the National Certification Board for Therapeutic Massage & Bodywork (NCBTMB) as a continuing education Approved Provider #515 for Licensed Massage Therapists. See Massage Continuing Education page [here](https://integrativehealingartsstudio.org/continuing-education-classes/continuing-education-for-lmts/) for more information. Within the studio you will also find [Raven's Corner Herbals & Enchantments](https://integrativehealingartsstudio.org/healing-boutique/), a charming little healing boutique offering crystals, handcrafted soy candles, aromatherapy products, herbal teas, loose herbs, books, plants, oracle cards and more. Services and Classes are by Appointment Only Shop my online dispensary for supplements and wellness products [here](https://us.fullscript.com/welcome/crossi1690587121/signup) Click through menu at top of page for more information about what the studio has to offer. For Blessed Cresteds, Crested Geckos and Supplies click [here](https://integrativehealingartsstudio.org/healing-boutique/blessed-cresteds/) Follow on social media for updates, inspiration, and educational holistic health information: Facebook pages are [Integrative Healing Arts Studio](https://www.facebook.com/IntegrativeMassageReiki/) & [https://www.facebook.com/RavensCornerEnchantments](https://www.facebook.com/RavensCornerEnchantments) Instagram [@integrativehealingartsstudio](https://www.instagram.com/integrativehealingartsstudio/) Please understand that I cannot personally advise you without seeing you first as a client in my studio.
